mapper.insert: insert into favorite (sidoName, gugunName, id) values(#{sidoName},#{gugunName},#{id})
mapper.select: select * from hospital where sidoName like concat('%', #{sidoName}, '%') and gugunName like concat('%', #{gugunName}, '%') limit 50
select * from shop where sidoName like concat('%', #{sidoName}, '%') and gugunName like concat('%', #{gugunName}, '%') limit 50
